nodes.text: This female Dark Jedi or Sith was present inside the Sith Academy on Korriban between the arrivals of Revan in 3956 BBY and Meetra Surik's in 3951 BBY. She left a Sith holocron inside the former Academy master's room and sealed it with her lightsaber.
It is rumored that Surik attempted to blast the sealed door with thorium charges, which damaged the holocron and made whatever information was stored in it impossible to recover.

If the player chose Revan to have been a Sith, this person was to have been Bastila Shan. If the canonical ending for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic is selected by the player and they have Visas Marr in their party while searching the Academy, she will notice the presence that had once been there and call her a Dark Jedi.
